name: aliyun-fc-http
description: 阿里云函数计算node环境http接口适配器

scripts.release-minor: npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m "auto release" && npm version minor -f && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-patch: npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m "auto release" && npm version patch -f && git push && npm publish

author: orange030
